articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Jesse Eisenberg on Tech Bros Pivoting to Politics: “Why Are They Not Spending Every Day Helping People?” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actor, who notably portrayed Mark Zuckerberg in 'The Social Network,' made an appearance on 'Real Time With Bill Maher.'
articles.content: Jesse Eisenberg, who famously portrayed Mark Zuckerberg in The Social Network, is sharing his perspective on several tech billionaires pivoting to politics with Donald Trump back in the White House.… [+2061 chars]
